paragraphs.text: Improvising is what I love the most in making music. There's ambition to take playing jazz to a higher level when the time comes.

paragraphs.title: Trio Romanello
paragraphs.html: A versatile jazz trio in which I play guitar. Click here for more information and bookings (dutch).

paragraphs.title: Jazzcats
paragraphs.html: Every month I invite different jazz musicians from The Netherlands to play with me at The Cat's Back, Tilburg.
